title: HI!How to solve the "device state error". help me please
content:
Hello everyone,
     I like pixel 3 very much, but about one month ago, there is something wrong with it, I was told my password is wrong, just like https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/4140400?hl=en.  i am sure it is correct,i can't unlock my phone,so i reboot it,then it can't start again,but i can enter fastboot mode,and it displayed "device state error".first time i followed Muhammed Zaid Alam said , and it indeed worked.
    But about one week ago,i was told my pin is incorrect again,this time i try to change my password with  the "find my phone"on Google,but it still wrong pin, and i tried to the erase the phone on web,it didn't work too,and it won't start again after reboot.Unfortunately this time the way didn't worked again. 
    I wanted to use a factory image to solve this. i download the image from https://developers.google.com/android/images. when i flashed the system image , it said  "FAILED (remote: 'Error getting device locked state No Response')
fastboot: error: Command failed"
    And "Device version-bootloader is 'b1c1-0.1-5343672'.
Update requires 'b1c1-0.1-5578427'.
fastboot: error: requirements not met!"

What should i do ?   Thank you very much.
